com.googlecode.sweetened
Class SweetenedLaunchTask

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      org.apache.tools.ant.Task
          com.googlecode.sweetened.SweetenedLaunchTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SweetenedLaunchTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task

Controller for the Sweetened ant Task. Sweetened generates .classpath files for Eclipse.

Author:
jon stevens

setSourcepath

public void setSourcepath(java.lang.String sourcepath)
Directory name which is appended before the filename of the jar file being referenced. So, if you have /Users/jon/lib/foo.jar and sourcepath="src", then the sourcepath attribute will be set to /Users/jon/lib/src/foo.jar and that should be where the source code to foo.jar lives.

getSourcepath

public java.lang.String getSourcepath()
Directory name which is appended before the filename of the jar file being referenced. So, if you have /Users/jon/lib/foo.jar and sourcepath="src", then the sourcepath attribute will be set to /Users/jon/lib/src/foo.jar and that should be where the source code to foo.jar lives.
